availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Caleb M. Mathews (Henry County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, attorney. Virginia native. Son of John Mathews and Sarah McDowell Mathews. Married to Frances L. Beazley Matthews in Woodford County, Kentucky, on January 2, 1838. Father of John W. Mathews, Joseph D. Mathews, Frank Mathews, Anna M. Mathews, and Sally Mathews. Graduate of Transylvania Law School in Lexington, Kentucky, in 1837. Trustee of Henry Academy and Henry Female College in New Castle, Kentucky. Attorney in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 82.

W. H. Perrin, J. H. Battle, and G. C. Kniffin, Kentucky: A History of the State, 6th ed. (Louisville and Chicago: F. A. Battey and Company, 1887), p. 76.
